description: table with white cloth; silver dish with piece of salmon at center; lobster and pink flowers in front; fowl with white feathers ant left; two-handled bulbous brownish vase in back at left with orange flowers; purple flowers around salmon
signed: LRC, in light brown: á mon ami F. Heilbuth [?] / E. Duez / 1883
text: Duez has remained a fairly obscure artist even though he exhibited at the Paris Salons for more than twenty years. He was known for his landscapes, but his talent as a colorist is clearly evident in this still life.
title: Still Life with Flowers and Salmon
